description: This file defines a React component 'NoteView' that displays the details of a specific note, including title, content, tags, and options to edit or delete the note. It interacts with the context 'NotesContext' and uses React Router hooks for navigation and parameter parsing.

methods.name: NoteView()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the detailed view of a note, with options to edit or delete.

methods.name: confirmDelete
methods.description: Asynchronous function that prompts user confirmation to delete the note, then performs deletion and navigates to home if confirmed.
